quickfix
Interface Acceptor

All Superinterfaces:
Connector
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSocketAcceptor, SocketAcceptor, ThreadedSocketAcceptor
public interface Acceptor
extends Connector

Accepts connections from FIX clients and manages the associated sessions.

Field Summary
static String SETTING_ACCEPTOR_TEMPLATE
          Acceptor setting specifying local IP interface address for accepting connections.
static String SETTING_SOCKET_ACCEPT_ADDRESS
          Acceptor setting specifying local IP interface address for accepting connections.
static String SETTING_SOCKET_ACCEPT_PORT
          Acceptor setting specifying port for accepting FIX client connections.
static String SETTING_SOCKET_ACCEPT_PROTOCOL
          Acceptor setting specifying the socket protocol used to accept connections.

Methods inherited from interface quickfix.Connector
block, getSessions, isLoggedOn, start, stop, stop
